briefTitle: A Randomised Trial Using Highly Purified Human Chorionic Gonadotropin (HP-hCG) and Recombinant Human Chorionic Gonadotropin (rhCG) in Women Undergoing Controlled Ovarian Stimulation
officialTitle: A Randomised, Controlled, Assessor-blind, Parallel Groups, Multicentre Trial Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of Highly Purified Human Chorionic Gonadotropin (HP-hCG) and Recombinant Human Chorionic Gonadotropin (rhCG) for Triggering of Final Follicular Maturation in Women Undergoing Controlled Ovarian Stimulation
summary: This trial is investigating the efficacy and safety of highly purified human chorionic gonadotropin (HP-hCG) and recombinant human chorionic gonadotropin (rhCG) for triggering of final follicular maturation in women undergoing controlled ovarian stimulation
